name: Simple HP bars - Pokemon Showdown
description:
This theme includes plain color hp bars, squared edges, and a dark HP background. Looks best with default dark showdown theme.

Majorish update: Since it was already looking pretty Sun and Moon-y I decided to just add the sun and moon splash background. This can be disabled by commenting out line 3 in the source
additional_info:
Update 0.0.1 - Made previous HP square
Update 0.0.2 - Skewed HP Brs
Update 0.0.3 - Unskewed status items and changed colors to mimic Pokemon Sun and Moon HP bars.
Update 0.1.0 - Sun and Moon style update
